title: How do digital publishers make money? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have look it up but amazon does the same formula as apple with books. 30 cent on the dollar goes to amazon and 70 cent goes to the author. This was in usa today so look up the article and also at libraries they sometimes have book publisher explain how they do this. There are different publishing companies besides digital. Just try go to local author when there at book publishing event. Maybe they amswer or see if libraries do this. Good luck
